oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Richard "Rick" Scrugham interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Scrugham, Richard; Caudill, Ed
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scrugham, Richard; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Richard T. Scrugham served as a helicopter pilot during the Vietnam War from June 1970-1971. The interview was conducted by Ed Caudill on January 16, 2019.
